model_details.description: This model is trained on RoBERTa large with the binary classification setting of the Stanford Sentiment Treebank. It achieves 95.11% accuracy on the test set.
model_details.short_description: RoBERTa-based binary classifier for Stanford Sentiment Treebank
model_details.paper:
[RoBERTa: A Robustly Optimized BERT Pretraining Approach (Liu et al)]
                  (https://api.semanticscholar.org/CorpusID:198953378)
